document_data.name: ''Moonstone Pendant''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''moonstone pendant''''' was an enchanted [[cleric]] [[amulet]] from [[Waterdeep]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The [[silver]] ''moonstone pendant'' appeared as two interlocking crescents, facing each other. The new moons left an opening in the middle of the pendant that glowed with gentle blue light.
document_data.Powers: The ''moonstone pendant'' gave the wearer the ability to cast the ''[[regenerate]]'' spell and mirrored its effects onto up to three allies in close proximity.
